mapper.select: SELECT A.SL_CL_YM AS PERF_YM /*실적년월*/ , A.CNTR_NO || '-' || A.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_DTL_SN /*계약상세번호*/ , DECODE(H.HIST_STRT_DTM, NULL, '', TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(H.HIST_STRT_DTM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYYMMDD')) AS CAN_DTM /*취소일자*/ , A.LEASE_SL_CTR_AMT AS SL_CTR_AMT /*매출조정금액*/ , A.LEASE_SL_CAN_AMT AS SL_CAN_AMT /*매출취소금액 - 취소조정(취소 잔여 매출액포함)*/ , DECODE(Y.MM_ISTM_PCAM_AMT, NULL, A.LEASE_SL_CTR_AMT, ROUND(A.LEASE_SL_CTR_AMT * (Y.MM_ISTM_PCAM_AMT/Y.MM_MPY_AMT), 0)) AS LEASE_SL_CTR_AMT /*매출조정금액 - 원금*/ , DECODE(Y.MM_ISTM_PCAM_AMT, NULL, A.LEASE_SL_CAN_AMT, ROUND(A.LEASE_SL_CAN_AMT * (Y.MM_ISTM_PCAM_AMT/Y.MM_MPY_AMT), 0)) AS LEASE_SL_CAN_AMT /*매출취소금액 - 원금*/ , DECODE(Y.MM_ISTM_PCAM_AMT, NULL, 0, A.LEASE_SL_CTR_AMT - ROUND(A.LEASE_SL_CTR_AMT * (Y.MM_ISTM_PCAM_AMT/Y.MM_MPY_AMT), 0)) AS CTR_PVDA_AMT /*매출조정금액 - 이자*/ , DECODE(Y.MM_ISTM_PCAM_AMT, NULL, 0, A.LEASE_SL_CAN_AMT - ROUND(A.LEASE_SL_CAN_AMT * (Y.MM_ISTM_PCAM_AMT/Y.MM_MPY_AMT), 0)) AS CAN_PVDA_AMT /*매출취소금액 - 이자*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'SL_CTR_DSC_TP_CD', B.SL_CTR_DSC_TP_CD) AS CTR_TP /*조정유형*/ , B.SL_CTR_RMK_CN /*취소조정사유*/ , (SELECT PD_NM FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS WHERE PD_CD = D.BASE_PD_CD) AS PD_NM /*상품명*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM(#{session.tenantId}, 'CMN_STAT_CH_RSON_CD', C.CNTR_STAT_CH_RSON_CD) AS STAT_CH_RSON_NM /*취소사유*/ , NVL(E.EOT_DLQ_AMT, 0) AS EOT_DLQ_AMT /*최종연체금*/ , NVL(F.EOT_BOR_AMT, 0) AS EOT_BOR_AMT /*최종위약금*/ FROM TB_CBCL_WELLS_SL_MM_CL_IZ A/*WELLS매출월마감내역*/ INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL D/*계약상세*/ ON A.CNTR_NO = D.CNTR_NO AND A.CNTR_SN = D.CNTR_SN AND A.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = D.SELL_TP_DTL_CD AND D.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_WELLS_BOR_AMT_BAS F /*WELLS위약금액기본*/ ON F.PERF_YM = A.SL_CL_YM AND F.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND F.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND F.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_SL_CTR_BAS B/*매출조정기본*/ ON B.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND B.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND A.SL_CL_YM BETWEEN B.SL_CTR_STRT_YM AND B.SL_CTR_END_YM AND B.SL_CTR_DSC_TP_CD = '13' AND B.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_RSG_PROCS_IZ C/*계약해지처리내역*/ ON C.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND C.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND C.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CBCL_DLQ_BAS E/*연체기본*/ ON E.PERF_YM = A.SL_CL_YM AND E.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND E.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND E.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL_STAT_CH_HIST H/*계약상세상태변경이력*/ ON H.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND H.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND H.CNTR_DTL_STAT_CD IN ('301', '302', '303', '304', '305') AND H.HIST_END_DTM = '99991231235959' AND H.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_PVDA_PLAN_BAS X/*현재가치할인차금계획기본*/ ON X.CNTR_NO = A.CNTR_NO AND X.CNTR_SN = A.CNTR_SN AND X.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_RVDW_PVDA_PLAN_DTL Y/*현재가치할인차금계획상세*/ ON X.PVDA_PLAN_NO = Y.PVDA_PLAN_NO AND Y.ISTM_TN = A.RENTAL_TN AND Y.MM_MPY_AMT = D.MM_ISTM_AMT AND Y.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' WHERE A.SL_CL_YM = #{perfYm} AND A.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = #{sellTpDtlCd} AND A.CNTR_NO = D.CNTR_NO AND A.CNTR_SN = D.CNTR_SN AND A.SELL_TP_DTL_CD = D.SELL_TP_DTL_CD AND (A.LEASE_SL_CTR_AMT <> 0 OR A.LEASE_SL_CAN_AMT <> 0) AND A.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' AND D.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY 1,2,3,4
